item.title: About
item.description: Hugo is a static site engine written in Go. It makes use of a variety of open source projects including: Cobra Viper J Walter Weatherman Cast Learn more and contribute on GitHub.

item.title: Intro to this site
item.description: Welcome to PhyloTips.info. From teaching my PhyloMeth course and working with students and colleagues in general, as well as the great example of Liam Revellâ€™s Phytools Blog, I decided to make a site where I could post tips to deal with problems of people working on phylogenies. Since I mostly use R for this (though this may change as Julia, Python, etc. grow)
